pages.text: Blobfish are fish that are located in the Deep Oceans.$(br2)They becomes pink if they're under less than 10 blocks of water pressure.$(br2)When slain, you can use 4 blobfish and 1 bottle to craft Fish Oil. This item allow limited levitation in water or rain and it can be used to tame $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/bald_eagle)Bald Eagles$(/l) too.
Like other fish, they can be bucketed.
